Shokotel Mini-hotel in Moscow 1 review of the hotel, room photos and prices – book Shokotel Mini-hotel online Image 2: Shokotel Mini-hotel Image 3: Shokotel Mini-hotel Image 4: Shokotel Mini-hotel Image 5: Shokotel Mini-hotel Image 6: Shokotel Mini-hotel Image 7: Shokotel Mini-hotel Image 8: Shokotel Mini-hotel Mini-hotel «Shokotel Mini-hotel» is located in Moscow. This mini-hotel is located in 13 km from the city center. You can take a walk and explore the neighbourhood area of the mini-hotel — Yugo-Zapadnaya, MSU Main Building and Moscow City. At the mini-hotel There are other services available for the guests of the mini-hotel. The staff of the mini-hotel speaks Russian. Плюсы отеля Нужно отметить, что отель находится на охраняемой территории и попасть туда можно через центральную проходную, которая находится на ул. Ковриков на полу тоже нет и в прихожке тоже..
